channel.title: Breaking the Ice (The Romance Trilogy)
channel.description:
*Breaking the Ice (The Romance Trilogy)* August 5 and 12 at 8 p.m. EDT / 5 p.m. PDT
![Breaking%20the%20Ice|300x453](upload://bfH2eO3H5mHIj3kk7ZrDbb5nrV6.jpeg)
Two sessions of Emily Care Boss's _Breaking the Ice _ Players will take on the roles of two characters who are starting to date. The game explores “what it’s like to fumble through those first impressions and feel the spark of mutual attraction arise.” This will be an original four-player variation of the game: Participants will pair up to form “teams,” with one player in charge of the rational/practical dimension of a character and the other taking on the emotional/passionate side. Look for lots of awkward moments and romantic comedy fun.
